name: Lifeline (sarathi)
description:
Two astronauts, stranded in space with only each other to survive. 

One astronaut’s booster packs is working. The other astronaut can add oxygen tanks to their side of the tether. Collect as many tanks as you can before your oxygen runs out!

WASD Keys to move. Backspace to reset.

It’s unintentionally a rage game.

Created for GMTK Game Jam 2021!
